law.catch_line: Release of juror from grand jury service and retention as petit juror.
law.text: If a juror selected is incapable of serving as a grand juror but capable of serving as a petit juror, the judge may, for good cause shown, release the juror from grand jury service and retain him as a petit juror.
law.history: Created 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 22, sec. 34, effective January 2, 1978.
